themes.description: Summarized themes extracted from the chat logs.

messages_id.description: IDs of messages that correspond to this theme. There should be just 3-4 IDs indicating start of the discussion, middle of the discussion, and end of the discussion.

name.description: The name of the theme represented as a short sentence.

emoji.description: An emoji that summarizes the name of the theme.

key_takeaways.description: Key takeaways that summarize the important points of the theme and opinions of the active participants
